metadata.name: Enchanted Mermaid #1
metadata.description: Our Enchanted Mermaids™ NFT collection was created from the desire to educate my two wonderful daughters about blockchain technology, and the love that they have for the world of mermaids. Stories of mermaids have existed for thousands of years.    This NFT collection celebrates these sirens of the deep with a story of an evil pirate, a captured mermaid King and Queen and tale of a magical treasure hunt. Our Enchanted Mermaids™ NFT collection will provide you with charmingly designed mermaid art and nine lucky individuals may even receive a coveted mermaid treasure card. 50% of all net proceeds will be donated to disadvantaged youth education funds.
